summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2008 MERCEDES BENZ ML350.  THE CONTACT STATED THAT THERE WAS A FUEL LEAK.  THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO DEALER WHO DIAGNOSED THAT THAT THE STEERING ASSEMBLY WOULD NEED TO BE REPLACED. THE CONTACT REFERENCED NHTSA CAMPAIGN ID NUMBER: 08V682000 (STEERING:HYDRAULIC POWER ASSIST SYSTEM) BUT THE VEHICLE WAS NOT INCLUDED IN THE RECALL.  THE VEHICLE WAS IN THE PROCESS OF BEING REPAIRED.  THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE AND CURRENT MILEAGE WAS 51,000.
